original_title: Don’t panic, enough fuel in stock: Kanchana
original_body_lines: Power and Energy Minister Kanchana Wijesekara requests the public not to panic over fuel shortages as the CPC and LIOC have adequate stocks in hand.
He said in a Twitter post that shortages are due to the non-placement of orders by fuel station owners anticipating a fuel price reduction.
"Dealers have been required to maintain a minimum stock of 50%. I have asked CPC to review and suspend the license of fuel stations that had not maintained their minimum stocks," he tweeted.
